changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE opportunities ( id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, uuid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL, account_id BIGINT, probability FLOAT, name VARCHAR(256), amount BIGINT, type VARCHAR(256), primary_campaign VARCHAR(256), description VARCHAR(256), opportunity_owner VARCHAR(36), created_by BIGINT, updated_by VARCHAR(256), updated_at TIMESTAMP, created_at TIMESTAMP, stage VARCHAR(256), is_deleted TINYINT );
